    • findProgress

      public Progress findProgress​(Medium medium)

      Checks if the user has a progress for the given medium.

      Parameters:
      medium - Medium which is used to search for a progress
      Returns:
      null, if not progress is found or the Progress that was found

    • addNewProgress

      public boolean addNewProgress​(Medium medium)

      Adds a new progress to the user.

      Parameters:
      medium - Medium for which a new progress should be added
      Returns:
      true, if adding was successful, false, if adding was not successful

    • removeProgress

      public boolean removeProgress​(Medium medium)

      Removes a progress for a given medium from the users progress list.

      Parameters:
      medium - Medium that is used to search the progress, that should be removed
      Returns:
      true, if removing was successful, false, if removing was not successful

      public int getNumberOfProgresses()

    • addNewRate

      public boolean addNewRate​(Medium medium, java.lang.Integer rating, java.lang.String description)

      This function add a rate to a medium and this user.

      Parameters:
      medium - medium that is used to get the rate for the user
      rating - is a number between 0 and 10
      description - this is the description which is set in the rate
      Returns:

    • findRate

      public Rate findRate​(Medium medium)

      this function find a rate in a given medium.

      Parameters:
      medium - contains the rate
      Returns:
      true if the rate was found, false if not

    • removeRateInUSer

      public boolean removeRateInUSer​(Medium medium)

      This function will remove a Rate from this user.

      Parameters:
      medium - contains the needed rate
      Returns:
      true if the rate was removed, false if not

    • findComment

      public Comment findComment​(Medium medium)

      This function will find a comment in a given medium.

      Parameters:
      medium - contains the needed comment
      Returns:
      false if no comment was found, else the comment

    • removeComment

      public boolean removeComment​(Medium medium)

      Parameters:
      medium - contains the needed comment
      Returns:
      true if the comment was removed, false if not
